sentences.en: A copy of the provisional agenda in enclosed for your information.
sentences.cn: 随信寄上一份暂定议事的日程安排供参考.

sentences.en: A provisional patent has been filed on the findings.
sentences.cn: 相关的临时专利已经提出注册申请.
所有这些结论都是暂时性的.

sentences.en: Both parties have to sign a provisional tenancy agreement.
sentences.cn: 然后双方签订一份临时租约.

sentences.en: Chapter V Monitoring of Import and Export and Provisional Measures.
sentences.cn: 第五章进出口监测和临时措施.

sentences.en: Even though they are provisional rules, they should be observed strictly.
sentences.cn: 这种临时性的法规我们也要严格遵守.

sentences.en: Location: Shaoshan street , high - speed beltway entrance of the Provisional.
sentences.cn: 地理位置: 韶山路旁, 临绕城高速入口.

sentences.en: Provisional personas are, in fact, a more fleshed - out persona hypothesis ( as described in Chapter 4 ).
sentences.cn: 实际上, 临时的人物角色是较为充实的人物角色的假设 ( 参见第4章 ).

sentences.en: Provisional regulation returned pair of ad volume respects to make strict control.
sentences.cn: 暂行规定还对广告音量方面做了严格控制.

sentences.en: Ten minutes ago Clive and I shook hands on a provisional agreement.
sentences.cn: 10分钟前,克莱夫和我就已经临时协议达成一致.

sentences.en: The provisional court in communities provides convenient access for residents.
sentences.cn: 临时法庭进社区,可以给周围群众提供不少方便.

sentences.en: The Provisional Urban Council provides and manages sports and recreational facilities.
sentences.cn: 临时市政局提供和管理体育及康乐设施.

sentences.en: They write to give their provisional acceptance of the contract.
sentences.cn: 他们写信临时接受此项合同.

sentences.en: We accept provisional bookings by phone.
sentences.cn: 我们接受电话临时预约。

sentences.en: We had passports and we would spend the money, so they gave us provisional visas.
sentences.cn: 我们有护照,又愿意花钱.他们于是在护照上作了临时签证.
